content.rendered:
June 2021

CloudAlly talks with Meighan on traveled the world with Salesforce – having presented at Surf Force (Ireland), North Africa Dreamin (Morocco), YeurDreamin (Amsterdam), Banff Dreamin (Canada), Dreamforce 17, Dreamforce 18, the Chicago World Tour, and more.

Resources

Interview Transcript and Article

Series

Thought Leader Talks Series on the CloudAlly Blog

Interview

Teresa Gracias

Head of Product and Content Marketing

Over 17 years of experience in the tech industry, helping clients use innovative digital marketing techniques and insightful content strategy to make the critical connect between their business and the customer.

excerpt.rendered: We chat with Meighan about her ongoing Salesforce World Tour, the Salesforce Slack acquisition, Salesforce Ohana, Women In Tech, and more…

jetpack-related-posts.title: It Simply Works Until It Doesn’t Tahoe Dreamin 18
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It Simply Works... Until it Doesn't At Tahoe Dreamin’ 2018, Daniel Stange and I, Meighan Brodkey, presented on the Admin track.  Salesforce empowers non-programmers to become App Builders and declarative developers in ways that administrators could only dream of before Visual Workflow and Process Builder had been introduced. Consequently, with…
